name: Legend of the Stickman
description:
Story :

In this game, you are playing by a stickman who is trapped in a dungeon. Your goal is to escape from here.

Credits : 

Twitter - https://twitter.com/doupatato

Controls : 

  • A, D - movement
  • Space - Jump

Tools Used : 

  • Unity
  • Visual Studio
  • PhotoShop
